channel.title: Signups on Gergő Vári's blog

item.description: Did You Become TOO Dependent on Big Tech Companies? I can help you become free again: I’ll send you instructions on how to decouple your infrastructure.
item.content:encoded:
Did You Become TOO Dependent on Big Tech Companies?

I can help you become free again: I’ll send you instructions on how to decouple your infrastructure.
